Skew

# Skew

## Usage

Please refer to the documentation on the Tailwind CSS website

## Compatibility

| Class              | Support        |
| ------------------ | -------------- |
| ```
skew-x-{n}
``` | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
skew-x-[n]
``` | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
skew-y-{n}
``` | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
skew-y-[n]
``` | ✅ Full Support |
